Services¶

This section covers the steps necessary to get the LOKP up and running.

Read One¶

Read an Activity or a Stakeholder based on its unique identifier (UUID). Multiple versions are returned if they exist, ordered by version number with the newest on top.

Read One (with pending)¶

asdf
